name: DUELite - Action RPG (boss battle)
description:
A game for the SGDJamII made by https://twitter.com/AngelRDev

You'd die a lot ;)

## PLEASE RATE and FEEDBACK APPRECIATED ##

CONTROLS:
- ASWD -> Movement

- LEFT CLICK -> Sword attack (up to x3 combo)

- RIGHT CLICK -> Fireball

- Q -> Shield

- Space -> Dash

As everyone, lot of things that I wanted to include on the game but there was no time. I'm thinking on fully developing this game. Let me know what you think.


# Music and UI icons from Humble RPG Game Dev Bundle (2018)
